text: - I'm Manu Thapar, CTO at MasterCard,
responsible for the value added services,
especially with a focus on AI,

applying AI and machine
learning for fraud detection.

If we look globally, there
is a lot of fraud happening,

which results in merchants
losing billions of dollars
in fraudulent transactions,

and results in bad end
customer experience, also.

So it's a challenge for older
rule-based systems to keep up.
We use a number of AWS services,

with the main focus
being the three key areas
that we need to be handled very well,

and that's performance,
resilience, and security.
With the solution we provided on AWS,
the fraud, the amount of fraud we catch
has gone up by about 3x,
without any effects of false positives.

In fact, the false positives
have gone down by 10x.

And this combined increase
in fraud detection
and decrease in false positives

means that the merchants
have a very useful solution,

and the end customers have a
much better customer experience
than they did before.
(gentle music)
